body:
"BUILDING TRUST THROUGH TEAM WORK EDUCATION AND SAFETY TO IMPROVE QUALITY OF LIFE THROUGH A FUN CONSISTENT ATMOSPHERE"

 

"CORE VALUES"

 

  TEAM WORK - EDUCATION - SAFETY - CONSISTENCY - TRUST

Your Daily Report: This report reflects if your performance is staying consistant with our "MISSION STATEMENT" and our "CORE VALUES" which is esential for the safety and care of the pets we care for to ensure our team is building the trust of the community.
